Name: Day of the Trumplings
About the game: Nobody knew where they came from…. nobody knew what they wanted… until it was too late! Trumplings! Frothing little vessels of rage have come to town, to knock down our Big Beautiful Walls and move their master into the Whitehouse! Use Gun Control to save America! Build Gun Towers stop the Trumplings before they clear a path to Armageddon! Take 3rd person control and gun down Trumplings in the streets as fast as you can fire, then smite their master with the mighty Fist of Truth! Violence is not AN answer, it’s THE answer! Take back your country NOW!
